title: Server downtime - I wish I had downtime
html: Our fair server took a dive over night or so. But no worries, it looks like things came back up before I even had much time to worry about it. Hooray for being mostly oblivious. :)
body: Our fair server took a dive over night or so.  But no worries, it looks like things came back up before I even had much time to worry about it.  Hooray for being mostly oblivious.  :)
